paper_abstract: Parametric Temporal Logic extends linear temporal logic by allowing the temporal operators to additionally specify quantitative and parametric bounds on event occurrences. In this paper, we revisit and provide improved solutions to the four important problems of emptiness, universality, finiteness and construction considered in the literature for this logic. (C) 2011 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Some results on Parametric Temporal Logic
